hicpp-no-assembler.description:
Description

Checks for assembler statements. Use of inline assembly should be avoided since
it restricts the portability of the code.

This enforces
rule 7.5.1
of the High Integrity C++ Coding Standard.
hicpp-no-assembler.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
